text: Oi! What are you doing here?
Can't you see I'm on a break?
Hey actually could you help me out a bit? Could you light me a ciggy? I'm a little impaired right now.
Ahhh, that's the stuff. Hey, you're not so bad man.
...can ya let me enjoy this  my cig in peace at least?
Listen... I'm just gonna repeat the same line over and over until you buzz off.
